name: Singing
description: YOU are the instrument! While it is a difficult skill to master, there is always high demand for a charismatic vocalist.

name: Electric Guitar
description: An hour a day, every day... or more, if you can spare the time. Be prepared for some discomfort in your fingertips, and if you stick with it, callouses.

name: Drum Kit
description: Probably not the best instrument for apartment dwellers. The basic are rather simple, but it is physically demanding at high tempos, and odd time signatures can take time to get used to.
